name: image-sources
author: Brooks Mershon and Chris Tralie (boilerplate code)
description: Extend scene actions to implement image sources for acoustic simulation

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -u image-sources -n image_sources -o build/image-sources.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.submit: npm run pretest && cat build/image-sources.js > main/image-sources.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/image-sources.js -c -m -o build/scene-extension.min.js && rm -f build/image-sources.zip && zip -j build/image-sources.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/image-sources.js build/image-sources.min.js
